name: Arakno Phobos Arena
description:
Download for Free this Intense Arcade Arena Shooting Game!
Tons of Action with High Quality Graphics and Controls, just like a PC/Console Game

Are you tired of shooting games where you can't move? This is the experience you are looking for.
Those spiders will never knew what did hit them.
Arachnophobia Arena is the new 3D shooter where you kill waves of enemies using a powerful arsenal.

But they are not defenseless , those aracnids fiends are fast, they are very aggressive and have fire projectiles. You can't stand still or you will become spider´s food.
If you are afraid of spiders, don't play it.
